## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> pass, wrapping the inliner pass.

This works in conjunction with the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisoranalysis">InlineAdvisorAnalysis</a> to facilitate inlining decisions taking into account module-wide state, that need to keep track of inter-inliner pass runs, for a given module. An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlineadvisor">InlineAdvisor</a> is configured and kept alive for the duration of the <a href="#a302bbe2963bced6cb8460b94f89dd0be">ModuleInlinerWrapperPass::run</a>.

Definition at line 61 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/inliner-h">Inliner.h</a>.
